#summary A JUnit-based UI-testing framework for testing Eclipse/RCP, SWT and Swing applications.

= Introduction =

[http://www.instantiations.com/windowtester/ WindowTester] is a commercial UI-testing tool available from [http://www.instantiations.com/index.html Instantiations].  Free licenses for open source committers are also [http://www.instantiations.com/company/opensource.html available].
